content:
Morning [[standup]]
- [[Timon]] working on [[search]] indexing
- [[Pumba]] debugging [[export]] [[OOM]]
- [[Simba]] refining [[auth]] refresh
- [[Zazu]] polishing [[UX]] in [[editor]]
Action: ticket for [[streaming export]].
Users want [[Hathi]] to respect one-line [[notes]]. No forced structure during quick capture.
Todo: sync with [[Trinity]] about next [[user interviews]].

Poem fragment:
"Scattered [[ideas]] like broken glass,
shine only when [[light]] passes."
Suggested [[contexts]] should be learned automatically via [[usage patterns]], not forced upfront.

1:1 with [[Timon]]
- Career growth towards [[lead engineer]]
- Blocker: [[API pagination]]
- Plan: pair with [[Pumba]].

Meeting with [[Trinity]] + [[Turiel]] ([[product sync]])
- [[Onboarding]] metrics priority
- [[Runbook]] needed for [[incidents]]
- Try an [[A/B test]].
Competitor [[Notedly]] launched [[voice notes]]. Need to test [[transcription]] quality vs cost.
Idea: allow pinning short [[stickers]] at top of [[notes list]].

[[Support]] triage
- [[PDF export]] crashes beyond 500 [[notes]]
- Candidate fix: [[chunked export]]
- Assign to [[Pumba]]
- Update [[CS]] team.
Observation: [[students]] rely heavily on mobile [[capture]]. [[Voice]] input is critical.
Quote from [[Stoicism]] — "What stands in the way becomes the way."

[[Engineering review]]
- [[CI]] flakiness persists
- [[Auth refresh]] delayed
- [[Export]] hotfix planned
Action: [[Simba]] to draft release notes.
User quote: "I need [[search]] that works for messy 2am [[thoughts]]." Add [[fragment search]].

Meeting with [[Trinity]]: [[pricing]] tiers
- Starter free
- Pro paid
- Team with [[SSO]]
Survey to follow.
Pack [[books]] for weekend — 'Deep Work' and 'Midnight Library'.

Weekly sync with [[Enheduana]]
- [[Roadmap]] progress good
- Discuss timing for [[VP Sales]] hire
- Feedback: clearer KPIs for [[Trinity]].
Bug: [[customer]] saw [[data mismatch]] from [[concurrent edits]]. Add [[edit history]] warning.

[[Retrospective]]
- Wins: fast [[code reviews]], improved [[tests]]
- Issues: [[CI]] instability
- Improvement: monthly [[incident drill]].
Grateful for the [[team]]. Small [[wins]] stack together.

Strategy note: Fix [[export]] with [[streaming]]. Medium-term refactor [[pipeline]] alongside [[auth]]. Prioritize [[onboarding]] A/B tests. Metrics: [[activation]], [[trial-to-paid]], [[NPS]]. Hire [[Support Lead]].
Tiny [[UX]] tweak: toggle off [[markdown preview]] for faster typing.
One-liner: "Ship small, learn loud."
Meeting with [[Turiel]] — update [[runbook]] for [[mobile]] incidents. Add [[customer communication]] templates.
Spike: compare [[open-source]] [[speech-to-text]] vs paid [[APIs]] for [[transcription]].
Todo: finalize [[VP Sales]] job spec and post by Monday.
Quote from [[book]]: "Notes are the archive of becoming."
Prototype: [[morning review]] card showing pinned [[stickers]], today's [[todos]], and recent [[captures]].
[[Customer]] reported deleted [[note]] reappeared after [[restore]]. Suspect [[replication lag]]. Add repro steps.
Reminder: visit new [[vinyl shop]]. Look for mellow [[jazz]].
Legal check: [[GDPR]] impact of [[audio transcription]]. Confirm [[data retention]] rules for [[EU customers]].
Reflection: [[Simba]] showed real leadership today during [[incident response]].
Todo: draft [[integration roadmap]] for [[Notion]] and [[Zapier]].
Quick note: [[Trinity]] suggested running more [[surveys]] to validate [[pricing model]].
Personal: reread chapter in [[Deep Work]]. Quote: "Clarity requires time in solitude."
Poem: "Between [[commits]] and [[coffee]], I sketch the edges of a [[dream]]."
Todo: ask [[Zazu]] for final [[UX review]] of [[editor toggle]].
Weekly feedback: [[Pumba]] wants clearer ownership in [[sprint planning]].
Market scan: [[Evernote]] losing share, opportunity for [[lightweight note apps]].
Todo: prepare [[status memo]] for [[Enheduana]]. Keep 3 bullets + 2 risks.
Reflection: playing [[music]] helps with [[focus]]. Current favorite: [[State of Grace]].
Research: [[mobile capture]] abandoned often halfway. Need [[telemetry]] to track drop-off.
Reminder: schedule [[incident drill]] for next Friday.
Bug: [[search]] failing for [[markdown code blocks]].
Sync with [[Turiel]] on [[board deck]]. Add [[revenue forecast]].
Personal: pick up new [[vinyl]] this weekend. Genre: [[lofi]].
